content: **in purl soho s linen quill** materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s linen quill 1 50% fine highland wool 35% alpaca and 15% linen each skein is approximately 439 yards/100 grams approximately 878 yards required we used kiln red and stonewall gray - us 5 3 75 mm straight or circular needles 2 gauge 20 stitches = 4 inches in stitch pattern unblocked 18 stitches = 4 inches in stitch pattern blocked size unblocked 19 1/2 inches wide x 65 inches long blocked 22 inches wide x 60 inches long **in habu s silk wrap paper** materials - 5 skeins of habu s silk wrapped paper 99% linen and 1% silk this color is white navy - us 4 3 5 mm straight or circular needles gauge 21 3/4 stitches = 4 inches in stitch pattern unblocked size unblocked 18 inches wide x 56 inches long blocked 20 inches wide x 60 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/linen-quill html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html
